snippet: Two real estate companies have agreed to a $16 billion deal for Archstone Enterprise, a residential landlord with buildings in coveted metropolitan markets.
abstract: Equity Residential announces it will be a majority partner in $16 billion deal to acquire Archstone Enterprise, giant private residential landlord with upscale buildings in coveted metropolitan markets; AvalonBay Communities will become a minority partner in the deal.
lead_paragraph: Two real estate companies have agreed to a $16 billion deal for Archstone Enterprise, a residential landlord with buildings in coveted metropolitan markets.

headline.seo: In Archstone Sale, Equity Residential and AvalonBay Divide Spoils
headline.main: Real Estate Rivals Divide Upscale Spoils
headline.print_headline: Real Estate Rivals Divide Upscale Spoils
